channel.title: YanilleScape (24/7) - Official
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://www.yanille.com/images/logo2.png[/img]
[center][B]Welcome to YanilleScape[/B] [QUOTE] YanilleScape is a server based completely in Yanille. It has no known working dupes that we have found yet. We have lots of members and its getting bigger every day.
It has everything pretty much, it has pking, and almost all skills (besides hunting, summoning and construction.)
YanilleScape has a good economy, and will not have much downtime at all. [/QUOTE]
The following was posted in 2009 as part of the first advertisements for YanilleScape. After 7 years, it's time we bring things back. This advertisment is for the original V1 revision of YanilleScape, in its state at which it was in 2009. In addition to bringing back one of the greatest server's in RSPS history, we are also bringing back YOU! If you played YanilleScape in the past, we most likely have you in our database, so you can login and begin where you left off.
[B]Relevant Video:[/B] https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUH0htMaeXk[/video]
[B]Media:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wEYAqXQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8xGRMZF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t6CA7DC.jpg[/img] (more coming soon)
[B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://"http://yanille.com"]Yanille.com[/URL] [B]Play Now:[/B] [URL=http://"http://yanille.com/YanilleScape.zip"]http://yanille.com/YanilleScape.zip[/URL] (Please note: As of right now, we only have a downloadable zip client. Just run "Play YanilleScape.bat") [/center]

Pretty sure i will enjoy this, be there soon.

item.title: YanilleScape (24/7) - Official
item.dc:creator: @JakexPW JakexPW
item.description:
@JakexPW wrote:

[center]

[center]Welcome to YanilleScape

[QUOTE]
YanilleScape is a server based completely in Yanille. It has no known working dupes that we have found yet. We have lots of members and its getting bigger every day.

It has everything pretty much, it has pking, and almost all skills
(besides hunting, summoning and construction.)

YanilleScape has a good economy, and will not have much downtime at all. [/QUOTE]

The following was posted in 2009 as part of the first advertisements for YanilleScape. After 7 years, it’s time we bring things back. This advertisment is for the original V1 revision of YanilleScape, in its state at which it was in 2009. In addition to bringing back one of the greatest server’s in RSPS history, we are also bringing back YOU! If you played YanilleScape in the past, we most likely have you in our database, so you can login and begin where you left off.

Relevant Video:

Media:

wEYAqXQ.png781×533


t6CA7DC.jpg769×508

(more coming soon)

Website: Yanille.com
Play Now: http://yanille.com/YanilleScape.zip
(Please note: As of right now, we only have a downloadable zip client. Just run “Play YanilleScape.bat”)
[/center]
